title: Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, comfortable, and not itchy, with long sleeves that are just the right length and plenty long to wear with leggings.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and Lightweight!
items.body: The perfect lightweight sweater! The fit is as expected and it is not scratchy. I wash and dry it in a laundry bag and it is holding up real well with no shrinkage at all. Read more
items.author: Heather V

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous and Warm
items.body: Quality, warmth, softness and absolutely gorgeous. I liked mine so much that I ordered 3 more in different colors. I am wearing a small with leggings. I love it. Read more
items.author: Marie B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the color
items.body: Sweater came literally less than 24 from when I ordered. I love the wine color, it’s beautiful. Runs smaller than expected I thot it would be baggier based on the sizing. It’s still a perfect fit and it’s long as well so great with leggings. The side slits are flattering. Not too big. I ordered medium and it fits nicely just not an oversized sweater. It’s fairly soft, not scratchy, warm but not overly thick. Best part is the color . And I got a great deal on it so I would recommend it easily. Read more
items.author: Aimee Bullis

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s just eh
items.body: The sweater fits ok but is much shorter than pictured and the arms are more narrow than pictured. Was expat long batwing style sweater but instead it’s just a normal fit. Read more
items.author: Stacey H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST SWEATER IN THE COSMOS!
items.body: THIS SWEATER!!! Not to bash Amazon, cause I'm not, I LOVE Amazon, but this sweater definitely is high end. It's beautifully made, the styling in great, the color (I got the green) is so perfect! I styled it with a denim shirt, but the possibilities are endless. Read more
items.author: Pam

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sewn together incorrectly. Item looks horrible.
items.body: Returning this sweater for a refund. Sweater is sewn together inside out with the tags and stitches showing on the good side of the material (not a design choice but an obvious mistake). Item is VERY poorly made Read more
items.author: Angela Burgess

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and warm
items.body: Very well made. Versatile. Size is perfect The color is great Read more
items.author: Yvonne

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Weird design
items.body: The material is extremely thin and very see- through. I would suggest wearing a shirt or a tank top underneath. The length wasn't long enough to cover the "backside". It's stretchy, but has no shape so it will make you look like a box. Most importantly, the stitching design is very weird. Around the sleeves and shoulder part, it looks like it is inside out, but the flank is right side up. I had to come back to this site to double check that I didn't receive a defect. I included pictures for reference. Read more
items.author: NancyYEmerald

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Blue, Dark Grey, Black, Sage, Coffee, Dusty Blue, Orange, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
